questions.question: Provides clearly defined objectives for students.
Treats all students in a respectful manner.
Presents course content in an organized manner.
Makes good use of examples and illustrations to clarify concepts.
Interprets difficult and abstract ideas.
Effectively communicates his/her knowledge of the subject to students.
Challenges me intellectually.
Has increased my interest in the subject.
My overall evaluation of this instructor's teaching.
As much as possible, did the instructor provide individual attention?
As much as possible, did the instructor encourage student participation?
As much as possible, did the instructor provide constructive feedback on work submitted?
How helpful to you were instructor's responses to questions that you asked?
Did supplemental materials (for example, website, audio/visual aids, etc.) enhance course content?
Did exams and assignments reflect materials emphasized in course?
Did the syllabus or other documents accurately reflect course content and grading?
Did the instructor begin and end class on time?
Was your work graded fairly?
Did the instructor return graded material in a timely manner?
Did the instructor keep his or her office hours?
